publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3679# Johann Lamont: Private Rented Housing Sector-That the Parliament notes with concern the lack of regulation of the private rented housing sector, despite the capacity of that sector to receive public funding through housing benefit; further notes the stark contrast between the obligations placed on landlords in the social rented sector and landlords in the private rented sector; believes that private sector landlords who are in receipt of public funding should be expected to meet minimum standards and procedures in the way that their properties are managed, in order to protect the rights of private sector tenants and their neighbours and to ensure probity in the distribution of public funds, and considers that the Scottish Executive should address these serious matters as a matter of priority.
S1M-3679# Private Rented Housing Sector (lodged on 3 December 2002) Christine Grahame*, Mr Tom McCabe*, Trish Godman*, Bill Butler*
S1M-3679# Private Rented Housing Sector (lodged on 3 December 2002) Dr Sylvia Jackson*

S1M-3679# Johann Lamont: Private Rented Housing Sector-That the Parliament notes with concern the lack of regulation of the private rented housing sector, despite the capacity of that sector to receive public funding through housing benefit; further notes the stark contrast between the obligations placed on landlords in the social rented sector and landlords in the private rented sector; believes that private sector landlords who are in receipt of public funding should be expected to meet minimum standards and procedures in the way that their properties are managed, in order to protect the rights of private sector tenants and their neighbours and to ensure probity in the distribution of public funds, and considers that the Scottish Executive should address these serious matters as a matter of priority. Supported by: Peter Peacock, Christine Grahame, Mr Tom McCabe, Trish Godman, Bill Butler, Dr Sylvia Jackson
S1M-3679# Private Rented Housing Sector (lodged on 3 December 2002) Brian Fitzpatrick*
S1M-3679# Private Rented Housing Sector (lodged on 3 December 2002) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3679# Private Rented Housing Sector (lodged on 3 December 2002) Pauline McNeill*
S1M-3679# Private Rented Housing Sector (lodged on 3 December 2002) Dr Richard Simpson*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3679# Private Rented Housing Sector (lodged on 3 December 2002) Elaine Smith*, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-3679# Private Rented Housing Sector (lodged on 3 December 2002) Elaine Thomson*, Donald Gorrie*, Alex Neil*
S1M-3679# Private Rented Housing Sector (lodged on 3 December 2002) Karen Gillon*, Karen Whitefield*, Bristow Muldoon*, Fiona McLeod*, Kate Maclean*, Scott Barrie*
S1M-3679# Private Rented Housing Sector (lodged on 3 December 2002) Ms Wendy Alexander*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Margaret Jamieson*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Janis Hughes*
S1M-3679# Private Rented Housing Sector (lodged on 3 December 2002) Linda Fabiani*, Robin Harper*, Ian Jenkins*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-3679# Private Rented Housing Sector (lodged on 3 December 2002) Brian Adam*

S1M-3679# Johann Lamont: Private Rented Housing Sector-That the Parliament notes with concern the lack of regulation of the private rented housing sector, despite the capacity of that sector to receive public funding through housing benefit; further notes the stark contrast between the obligations placed on landlords in the social rented sector and landlords in the private rented sector; believes that private sector landlords who are in receipt of public funding should be expected to meet minimum standards and procedures in the way that their properties are managed, in order to protect the rights of private sector tenants and their neighbours and to ensure probity in the distribution of public funds, and considers that the Scottish Executive should address these serious matters as a matter of priority. Supported by: Christine Grahame, Mr Tom McCabe, Trish Godman, Bill Butler, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Brian Fitzpatrick, Tommy Sheridan, Pauline McNeill, Dr Richard Simpson, Ms Sandra White, Elaine Smith, Fiona Hyslop, Elaine Thomson, Donald Gorrie, Alex Neil, Karen Gillon, Karen Whitefield, Bristow Muldoon, Fiona McLeod, Kate Maclean, Scott Barrie, Ms Wendy Alexander, Marilyn Livingstone, Margaret Jamieson, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Janis Hughes, Linda Fabiani, Robin Harper, Ian Jenkins, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Brian Adam, Mr Jamie Stone*, Cathy Peattie*
S1M-3679# Private Rented Housing Sector (lodged on 3 December 2002) Nora Radcliffe*, Ms Margo MacDonald*
